menu.texts1: Hi, I'm Dario. My passion is technology and learning. Since I was a child, I've been fascinated by how technology changes the world. I'm always seeking to learn something new, whether it's disassembling devices or taking online courses. I believe that continuous learning is essential for growth. My goal is to continue exploring the world of technology and sharing my knowledge with other enthusiasts. Connect with me if you share these interests!
